statements: UPDATE Customers SET email='newemail@example.com', total_purchases_amount=1500.50 WHERE customer_id=12345;
UPDATE Customers SET first_purchase_date='2022-03-15', phone_number='9876543210' WHERE customer_name='John Doe';

UPDATE Customers SET total_purchases_amount=total_purchases_amount+1000, first_purchase_date='2022-01-15'
WHERE customer_id=3;
UPDATE customers SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE orders SET total_amount=1500.50 WHERE order_id=100;
UPDATE customers SET registration_date = '2022-09-01', first_name = 'John' WHERE customer_id = 1;

UPDATE transactions SET amount = 99.99, transaction_date = '2022-06-10' WHERE transaction_id = 201
UPDATE customers SET amount_spent = amount_spent + 100.00, last_purchase_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE customer_id = 101
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE transaction_id = 201
UPDATE customers SET name = 'John Doe', age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE orders SET total_amount = 500.00, order_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE order_id = 100;

UPDATE Orders SET order_amount = 49.99, order_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE order_id = 201;

UPDATE Orders SET order_amount = order_amount * 1.1, order_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE customer_id = 456 AND order_date < '2022-01-01';
